long_description:
You roll off the elevator into a long hallway that matches the
hallway below, although it has one less door. It is long and
brightly lit. Your audio sensors detect faint readings to the
north.
You enter a long and brightly lit hallway.
You enter a long and brightly lit hallway.
You enter a long and brightly lit hallway.
You enter a long and brightly lit hallway.
short_description: You are in a long brightly lit hallway.
name: Hallway 2
